testcase.name: Gmail Login Test With Valid Credentials
testcase.system-out: Given Browser is lanuched...................................................passed And gmail url is entered....................................................passed Then I should be on the gmail login page....................................passed When I enter the valid username "loing@gmail.com"...........................passed And I enter the valid password "123"........................................passed And I click on signing button...............................................passed Then I should be seeing the inbox page......................................passed
